testcase.classname: Execute get request on trademe sandbox and verify the number of named carMakes
testcase.name: number of named car makes
testcase.system-out: Given I have basePath "getUsedCars".........................................passed When I execute Get request..................................................passed Then I verify the count of named cars in response to be "78"................passed

testcase.classname: test the car makes and number of listings
testcase.name: get the count of listed named cars
testcase.system-out: Given I am on TradeMe home page.............................................passed When I click on Motors search...............................................passed Then I evaluate count of all named cars "78"................................passed

testcase.classname: test the car makes and number of listings
testcase.name: get the count of listings for specific car makes
testcase.system-out: Given I am on TradeMe home page.............................................passed When I click on Motors search...............................................passed And search for car make "Ferrari"...........................................passed Then I evaluate the count of total listings for the "Ferrari"...............passed
